definition: internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)

sentences.english: And then we let the ball develop into a fully grown inner ear.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，我们让泡囊发育成一个成熟的内耳。

sentences.english: The inner ear and the semicircular canal and utricle balance function main balloon.
sentences.chinese: 内耳的半规管以及椭圆囊和球囊主要有平衡功能。

sentences.english: There are otolithic organs in the inner ear of vertebrates.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎动物的内耳中存在耳石器官。

sentences.english: The inner ear is a closed system surrounded and protected by the petrous portion of the temporal bone.
sentences.chinese: 内耳是一个受到颞骨坚硬部分包围和保护的封闭系统。

sentences.english: The lab's research into the regeneration of hair cells for transplantation into the inner ear to cure deafness will also continue.
sentences.chinese: 这项治愈耳聋的内耳毛细胞再生移植研究将继续下去。

sentences.english: Injuries of inner-ear were also observed.
sentences.chinese: 同时重点观察了内耳的损伤。

sentences.english: Babies need to experience head movement that stimulates the otoliths in the inner ear.
sentences.chinese: 宝宝需要很多头部运动来刺激内耳中的内耳石。

sentences.english: Babies need to experience head movement that stimulates the otoliths in the inner ear.
sentences.chinese: 宝宝需要很多头部运动来刺激内耳中的内耳石。

sentences.english: The inner ear contains tiny hair cells that deform when sound waves hit them.
sentences.chinese: 内耳含有声波撞击即可变形的纤细的毛细胞。

sentences.english: He developed a disorder in his inner-ear.
sentences.chinese: 他开发了一种在他的内耳疾病。

sentences.english: "Steven got a cut inside his inner ear, " revealed Hodgson.
sentences.chinese: “斯蒂文的内耳有着一个创口，”霍奇森透露到。

sentences.english: The labyrinth is the organ in your inner ear that enables you to maintain balance.
sentences.chinese: 内耳迷路是耳内的一个器官，能让你保持平衡。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efferent pathway from the dorsal raphe nucleus to the inner ear.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中缝背核至内耳的传出神经通路。

sentences.english: Inner ear is the key in the auditive system.
sentences.chinese: 在外周听觉系统中，核心部分是内耳的耳蜗。

definition: ossicles (of the middle ear)/three ossicles, acting as levers to amplify sound, namely: stapes or stirrup bone 鐙骨|镫骨, incus or anvil bone 砧骨, malleus or hammer bone 錘骨|锤骨
external auditory meatus/auditory canal, between the outer ear 外耳 and tympanum 鼓膜
chain of ossicles (in the middle ear)
internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3

definition: ossicles (in the middle ear)/also written 聽小骨|听小骨
stapes or stirrup bone of middle ear, passing sound vibration to the inner ear
Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
